data.title: United States
data.meta_description: Duke Cru is a Christian student organization at Duke University in Durham, North Carolina.
data.text:
Congrats on your acceptance to Duke, Class of 2028! (and also a warm welcome to new graduate students, staff, and faculty!) We would love to connect with you over email or by filling out this quick form. Can't wait to meet you!

Thank you for checking out Duke Cru! We are a caring community, passionate about connecting people to Jesus. We are committed to loving others deeply and to continually creating a space for individuals to explore what they believe about God. Whether you're certain of your spiritual beliefs or have not yet begun that journey, you are welcome at Cru! From your first time at Cru to your fiftieth, we hope you will experience the love of Jesus and hear about the hope He has to offer to our broken world.

There are many different types of students at Duke. Wherever you are from and whatever your background is, Cru wants to be a home where all are welcome!

​

Duke Cru

Undergraduate and Graduate Students

Contact: Ethan Allen

ethan.allen@cru.org

​

Athletes in Action

Duke Athletes

Contact: Charlie Densmore

charlie.densmore@cru.org

Bridges International

International Students

Contact: Kurt Bubalo

kurt.bubalo@bridgesinternational.com

​

​

As Cru staff members, our hope is to love students deeply but love Jesus even more so. We desire to care for students by continually pointing them to Jesus and equip them to follow Him during their time at Duke and throughout the rest of their lives.

These are our wonderful 2023-2024 interns! They have each graciously sacrificed part of their busy schedules as Duke juniors and seniors to help Cru run smoothly. If at any point you have any questions or want to speak with upperclassmen, they would love to be a resource for you.
